sentences.sContent: an attempt to quantify the region’s social and economic decline
sentences.sCn: 对该地区社会和经济衰退进行量化的尝试

sentences.sContent: ...The urge to quantify is embedded in our society...
...Trying to quantify or measure the impact of women in politics is hard because in very few countries have there been enough women in politics to make a difference...

words.tran: [数][语] 量词；数量词；精于计算的人

trans.tranOther: to calculate the value of something and express it as a number or an amount
